comments.text: Once bug 586842 is fixed, we should be able to do this. It'd reduce the number of pointer chases needed to get the class.

comments.text: Yes, now that slow arrays are gone the road here is clear.  I'd like to do this soon as it will allow some new optimizations and clean up a fair bit of gunk that exists for mapping types to classes.
